caption.center: Raymond FAULKNER, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Fayette Circuit Court; L. T. Grant, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Anthony M. Wilhoit, Public Defender, William C. Ayer, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, Frankfort, for appellant.
Ed W. Hancock, Atty. Gen., Robert L. Chenoweth, Asst. Atty. Gen., Frankfort, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Memorandum Opinion of the Court by Justice JONES, Affirming.[fn*]
[fn*] Opinion ordered not to be published.
